sourcesContent:
import { Component, ElementRef, OnInit, ViewChild, inject } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { ThreeService } from '../../core/api/three.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hero', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `
Full Stack Performance

Building scalable experiences.

Senior Ionic Angular Developer specializing in crafting high-performance, cross-platform digital architectures that wow users.

` }) export class HeroComponent implements OnInit { @ViewChild('canvasContainer', { static: true }) canvasContainer!: ElementRef; private threeService = inject(ThreeService); ngOnInit() { this.threeService.initHeroScene(this.canvasContainer.nativeElement); } }
